column1: This file will be used to upload data to the FCPathologyDB. FIELD NAMES CAN BE ADDED, BUT SHOULD BE DONE SPARINGLY

column7: The observation ID being measured, whether it is a row ID, plant ID, sample ID, tissue ID, plate ID, culture ID, well ID, DNA ID, microbe ID, extract ID, env ID, seed ID
The parameter being measured. The measurement paraemter is unique.
The username of the user taking the measurement. Example: firstname_lastname
The datetime when the measuremnt was taken. Recommended format: 2015-01-30 14:50
The actual result or value of the measurement.
Any additional comments about the measurement.
Experiment the measurement is attached to

column2: For recording the parameter being measured.

column7: A unique name for the parameter being measured. Example: afl.afl, nlb.ds1, dys.ath, 1K CO2, 5K CO2. MSUT BE UNIQUE
A descriptor for the type of measurement being done. Example: Respiration, Toxin, Plot, Plant, Environmental
A detailed description for how the measurement is taken, include the model of any instrument used.
The unit that is relevant to the measurement. Example: g, kg, ppm, ml
